name: SologoAI
description: SologoAI is an AI-powered platform for creating customizable logos and brand kits for commercial use.
longDescription: SologoAI is an innovative AI-driven platform designed to simplify logo and brand identity creation for businesses, startups, and individuals. By leveraging advanced artificial intelligence, it allows users to generate professional logos from brand names, images, sketches, or text prompts without requiring design expertise. The platform supports multilingual logo generation and provides comprehensive brand kits, including assets like business cards and social media posts. Its mission is to make branding accessible, affordable, and efficient, empowering over 100,000 startups and businesses worldwide to establish a cohesive visual identity. SologoAI’s user-friendly interface and customization tools cater to a wide range of industries, from tech to retail, ensuring tailored designs that align with each brand’s vision.
features: Generate professional logos instantly from brand names, images, or sketches, requiring no design skills.
Create cohesive brand kits with assets like business cards, social media posts, and posters in one step.
Customize logos and brand kits with an AI-powered online design canvas, adjusting colors, fonts, and layouts.
Support multilingual logo generation, allowing designs in various languages and scripts for global use.
Export logos in high-quality formats (PNG, JPG, PDF, SVG) suitable for both digital and print media.
Preview AI-generated logos on real-world items like mugs, T-shirts, and business cards for visualization.
Offer unlimited text-to-logo generations, enabling users to experiment with various design ideas.
Transform user-uploaded photos or sketches into polished, scalable logos with AI-driven precision.
Provide clear commercial-use licenses with an active subscription, ensuring unrestricted use across media.

faqs.question: Is SologoAI free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, SologoAI offers a free plan allowing up to 10 image-to-logo designs and unlimited text-to-logo generations, with additional paid features for vector downloads.

faqs.question: Can I use the generated logos for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: With an active subscription, SologoAI provides full commercial-use rights for logos and brand kits across all regions and media types.

faqs.question: What file formats are available for logo downloads?
faqs.answer: Logos can be downloaded in high-quality PNG, JPG, PDF, and SVG formats, suitable for both digital and print use.

faqs.question: Can I create a logo from a sketch or photo?
faqs.answer: Yes, SologoAI’s AI can transform uploaded sketches, drawings, or photos into professional, customizable logos in seconds.

faqs.question: Does SologoAI support branding for specific industries?
faqs.answer: SologoAI offers tailored templates and suggestions for over 50 industries, including tech, retail, sports, and fashion.

faqs.question: How long does it take to generate a logo?
faqs.answer: Logo generation takes just a few seconds, with instant customization options available to refine the design.

faqs.question: Can I preview my logo on different products?
faqs.answer: Yes, SologoAI allows users to visualize their logos on items like business cards, merchandise, and social media posts.

faqs.question: Is it possible to edit my logo after generation?
faqs.answer: Users can fully customize logos using SologoAI’s AI-powered design canvas, adjusting colors, fonts, and layouts.
